explains: adj. 最快速的（fast 的最高级）

sentences.en: It is the nation's fastest growing national daily newspaper.
sentences.cn: 这是该国发展最快的全国性日报社。

sentences.en: Kenya's Robert Kibe was the fastest qualifier for the 800 metres final.
sentences.cn: 肯尼亚的罗伯特·凯布是800米决赛入围者中速度最快的选手。

sentences.en: Vick carved out his niche as the fastest quarterback in American football.
sentences.cn: 维克凭借自身努力成为了足球队中最快的四分卫。
